item.title: Building a Minimalist Website with Hugo in a Day
item.description: How much time do you need to build a personal website with a blog module? I've been having this idea in mind for several weeks - building my personal website. But having another full-time job, you get to plan your time well before you kick-off a side project. Otherwise you might feel like you would never see the end of it. That is my personal experience. Now, the question is how?
